    public class ConversationActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Activity where participants exchange messages.

      • AddEvents

        private void AddEvents()
        Registers events.

      • AddMessageToConversation

        private void AddMessageToConversation(Message message)
        Adds new message to the conversation. This function was meant to counter the double messages that appear when user sends the message at the same time refresh event runs.
        Parameters:
        message -
